title: Finding Famous
description: Famous' adventure began with fairy tales of monsters, witches and wizards. The fairy tales her mother had told her as a child.One day she asked her mother where she came up with such fantastic stories. She told Famous that they were stories from her journey to finding her and one day she too would take the same journey.Her Mother's dying wish was for Famous to take the journey she had taken years before. The journey to where she had found Famous. An adventure that turned out to be so much like those fairy tales. Her childhood stories come to life in this epic adventure, years after her Mother's death.Finding the journal was the beginning of finding herself the way her mother had found her. Famous finds herself faced with the unbelievable characters she had thought could only exist in fairy tales.
author: Alexis Anicque
